DOC.brief_title: Applications Site Reactions After Injection Insulin Detemir Saline Subjects With Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diabetes mellitus HbA1c < 11 % BMI : 2035 kg/m2 Insulin detemir naive Basal insulin dose > 20E Known allergy study drug Current steroid antiallergic treatment Lipodystrophy Change insulin antihypertensive treatment < 30 day Smokers alcoholic
